Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AbsoluteEffectAn Effect that simply sets the values of the relevant state variables
AbstractStateComparatorComparator for states that only uses certain dimensions of the state space
AverageInterface for objects that approximate a given state as a weighted average of other states
Average::ObserverInterface for objects that wish to be notified when an Average changes how it approximates its query state
AveragerInterface for objects that construct Average objects
CompositeTask
ConstantStateFunctionA function whose value is constant
CoverTree< T, Metric >Container for data of type T that supports searches for nearest neighbors, using a distance function object of type Metric
CoverTree< T, Metric >::LinkDataObject that tracks the iteration through a Node's list of children
CoverTree< T, Metric >::LinkData::CompareComparator that compares LinkData objects by the level of each one's current Node
CoverTree< T, Metric >::NodeRepresentation of an individual instance
CoverTree< T, Metric >::Node::CompareComparator for sorting the children by depth
DiscretizationAverager
DiscretizationAverager::DiscretizationAverageImplementation of Average used by DiscretizationAverager
DiscretizedPrimitiveTaskThis specialization of PrimitiveTask optimizes the combination of PrimitiveTask with a dynamic (model) discretization averager that approximates a given point with a uniform distribution over the basis states added to the points grid cell
DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::AbsoluteEffectCountsComparator
DistanceFunctionScaled Euclidean distance between states
DynamicAveragerInterface for Averagers that permit the dynamic (user-directed) growth of the set of states used to approximate query states
EffectInterface for objects representing a deterministic effect of an action
FalseStatePredicateA binary function whose value is always false
GoalStatePredicateA binary function that returns true for states that match fixed goal values on some dimensions
GridworldA representation of a rectangular grid with interior walls that allows users easily to determine available directions of travel in each cell
InterpolationAveragerAn Averager that uses multilinear interpolation to approximate states
InterpolationAverager::InterpolationAverageImplementation of Average used by InterpolationAverager
KernelAveragerAn Averager that uses Gaussian kernels to approximate states
KernelAverager::KernelAverageImplementation of Average used by KernelAverager
LessFirst< PairT >Comparator that compares pairs only by the first part of each pair
MDPThis class combines the representational decisions of an Averager with a set of action models to obtain a concrete Markov decision process
MDP::StateImplementation of the MDPState interface
MDP::State::ActionImplementation fo the MDPStateAction interface
MDPStateInterface for objects that maintain MDPStateAction objects for each action available at a certain state
MDPState::ObserverInterface for objects that wish to be notified when a MDPState changes
MDPStateActionInterface for objects that give the dynamics of a certain state-action pair in the standard MDP representation
ModelBasedStatePolicyA refinement of the StatePolicy interface that provides a pointer to the local MDP data for the represented state
NegationPredicate
PlannerClass that uses value iteration to output StatePolicy objects given an MDP
Planner::DecisionStateClass representing states at which the planner must determine the optimal action
Planner::DecisionState::ActionMaintains the value for a state-action
Planner::ValueStateBase class for states that are reachable from some state given to policy(), which must have some value that can be backed up
Planner::ValueState::ObserverInterface for objects that want to receive notification when the value of a ValueState changes
PredictorThis object outputs StateActionModel objects given a Planner object (and the policy it implies) as input
Predictor::StateThe primary data structure used by Planner, this class stores the predicted reward and terminal-state distribution for a nonterminal state
Predictor::StatePredictionInterface for reachable states that facilitates backups of the predicted return and predicted terminal-state distribution
Predictor::TerminalStatePredictionAn implementation of StatePrediction for terminal states
PrimitiveTaskA Task that represents a primitive action provided by the environment
PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionDataA simple struct for storing the observed outcomes for a particular state-action pair
PrimitiveTask::PrimitiveStateActionModelA model of a primitive action at a given instance state, generalized from data
PrimitiveTask::VectorEffectCountsComparator
PriorityQueue< Key, HashFcn >A generic implementation of a priority queue
ProjectionAveragerAn Averager that projects a given state onto the state subspace obtained by ignoring certain state dimensions
ProjectionAverager::ProjectionAverage
StateActionModelInterface for objects that predict the dynamics of a given action at a given state
StateActionModel::ObserverInterface for objects that wish to be notified when a StateActionModel changes its estimation of its state-action's dynamics
StateFunctionAn object that computes a real-valued function over states
StateHasherFunction object used to hash states, for use with __gnu_cxx::hash_map
StatePolicyInterface for objects that specify an action (subtask) to execute at a given state
StatePolicy::ObserverInterface for objects that wish to be notified when a StatePolicy changes the action it selects
StatePredicateAn object that computes a binary function over states
TaskInterface for an arbitrary task, which may either be a primitive action or an option-like temporal abstraction
TrueStatePredicateA binary function whose value is always true
VectorEffectAn Effect that performs vector addition to states to which it is applied
ZeroStateFunctionA function whose value is always zero
